What is Lorolingo?

Lorolingo is a language learning app designed to help children learn vocubulary in a foreign language. The app uses children\'s natural ability to hear and distinguish the sounds of foreigns languages by linking them with everyday objects


How can my child use Lorolingo?

Lorolingo can be used in two ways:
1) by passing the device to your child, having first selected a language, and allowing them to play and choose images independently.
2) By selecting a language and interacting with your child. Ask them questions in the target language like \"donde esta la mariposa\" and have them select the butterfly icon, for example.


Why is the app free?

Lorolingo started as a side-project of mine with the aim of improving my Android development skills and filling a gap that currently exists in the Android app market - that is, good quality learning resources for parents trying to teach their children a foreign language.
